options.text: Creating intelligent systems that learn and adapt
Building the technology that powers websites and apps
Working with numbers and data to find insights

q2.text: What type of problem are you most excited to solve?

options.text: Designing a seamless user experience
Optimizing complex data-driven systems
Finding creative solutions to visual or verbal challenges

q3.text: What kind of data would you prefer to work with?

options.text: Structured data in tables and databases
Unstructured data like images, audio, or text
User interaction data to improve an application

q4.text: How do you prefer to apply your skills?

options.text: Building a full-stack web application
Developing a machine learning model
Visualizing data in a report or dashboard

q5.text: When building a system, what part excites you more?

options.text: Creating the logic and APIs on the server-side
Designing the user interface and interactions
Working on both parts of the system

q6.text: What kind of projects are most appealing?

options.text: Projects that require complex math and algorithms
Projects that require creativity and design thinking
Projects that are highly collaborative and involve many teams

q7.text: What is more satisfying at work?

options.text: Seeing your code deployed to production
Building a model that accurately predicts outcomes
Presenting insights that drive business decisions

q8.text: When troubleshooting an issue, do you prefer to focus on:

options.text: The server and database logs
The user's experience and UI flow
The data integrity and analysis pipeline

q9.text: What kind of project do you find more challenging?

options.text: Making a machine understand spoken language
Handling millions of user requests at once
Finding a single meaningful insight in a massive dataset

q10.text: What appeals to you most about a codebase?

options.text: It's clean, well-documented, and easy to maintain
It's new and you get to build it from scratch
It handles complex algorithms and data structures
